__schema__.description: Schema for Tauri v2 capability files (src-tauri/capabilities/*.json). Vendored locally to avoid network fetch errors.

events.description: Allow the main window to listen to Tauri core events (frontend subscribe).

fs-appdata-read.description: Allow reading policy and config files from AppData (read-only)

fs-appdata-write.description: Allow creating and writing policy/config files under $APPDATA/uicp (scoped, no Desktop access)

fs-desktop-write.description: Allow the main window to persist files within the UICP AppData scope and gated Desktop exports via the Tauri fs plugin.
